About Me

Hello, I am Xue Li, and you can also call me Liv. I hold a PhD in Astrophysics and Cosmology, and I am thrilled to bring my expertise from the astrophysical realm and my passion for data-driven research to the field of data science. My journey has taken me from exploring the mysteries of the universe to harnessing data for insights and innovation.

Feel free to contact me at lixue.liv@outlook.com.

Data Science

entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Quick Navigation

About Me
Data Science and Analytical Expertise
Technical Skills
Certifications

About Me

Hello, I am Xue Li, and you can also call me Liv. I hold a PhD in Astrophysics and Cosmology, and I am thrilled to bring my expertise from the astrophysical realm and my passion for data-driven research to the field of data science. My journey has taken me from exploring the mysteries of the universe to harnessing data for insights and innovation.

Feel free to contact me at lixue.liv@outlook.com.

Data Science and Analytical Expertise

Relevant Data Analysis Experience

I’ve dedicated my career to the art of data analysis and interpretation. My expertise encompasses data collection, modeling, and trend identification:

  • Proficiency in data collection and analysis, using tools like Python, R, and SQL.
  • A knack for data modeling and trend identification, revealing actionable insights.

Relevant Research Funding and Proposals

My astrophysical journey has been centered around data analysis and advanced statistical techniques:

  • 2016-2021: National Post-Doctoral Fundings
    • Selected as one of the top 10 researchers sponsored nationwide in the field of astrophysics and astronomy in 2016.
  • 2017-2018: Yunnan Observatory
    • Conducted studies involving data analysis on transients and cosmology.

Data-Driven Insights from Astrophysics

Here are some of the key projects where I applied data analysis and statistical skills:

  • Advanced Machine Learning in Astrophysics

    • Collaborated on data collection, machine learning model building, and data analysis using R, TensorFlow, and Python.
    • Applied AI and ML techniques to classify supernovae, translating data into meaningful insights.

  • Web Scraping and Social Media Analysis

    • Conducted web scraping and social media analysis for real-time insights into astronomical events.
    • Utilized TensorFlow and data mining techniques to model netizen behavior, providing valuable insights.

  • Time Series Data Analysis

    • Applied mathematical and statistical tools to analyze time series data, revealing patterns and trends.
    • Presented findings at the American Astronomical Meeting in 2022, demonstrating expertise in data-driven research.

  • Identifying Supernova Origins

    • Utilized coding languages like Matlab and Python for in-depth data analysis.
    • Discovered the origin of supernova explosions, contributing to astrophysical understanding.

  • Cosmological Data Analysis

    • Conducted extensive data analysis on cosmological data, pioneering the identification of intrinsic trends.
    • Applied data science techniques to measure cosmological parameters.

Technical Skills

My analytical and coding skills extend to areas relevant to data science:

  • Python
  • TensorFlow
  • Matlab
  • IDL
  • R
  • SQL
  • Machine Learning
  • Data Collection
  • Data Mining
  • Data Modeling
  • Data Trend Analysis
  • Data Visualization

Certifications

I hold the following professional certifications:

  • TensorFlow Developer Certificate
  • Power Platform Solution Architect Expert Certification
  • Power BI Analyst Associate Certification
  • Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate Certification
  • Azure Data Scientist Associate Certification
  • Azure AI Engineer Associate Certification

Feel free to explore the rest of my website to discover my professional research and personal interests.
